item.title: Magic Castle - Terraforming the cloud to teach HPC at 9:00 AM EST on Thu, Feb 2, 2024
item.description: SIGHPC Education Webinar Magic Castle - Terraforming the cloud to teach HPC Are you new to the world of HPC and are trying to find an affordable and accessible way that you can learn, practice and experiment? Do you miss the days when learning about HPC was connecting a few gray boxes together and configuring a cluster? Do you wish you could transfer all the complexity inherent in production HPC systems into an accessible sandbox environment, designed to facilitate teaching and experimental development?

item.title: Computational Science Education Committee Meeting at 9:00 AM EST on Wed, Jan 1, 2024
item.description: Computational Science Education Committee will meet on the 4th Wednesday of the month at 9am eastern over the next several months. We will discuss ongoing computational science currciulum projects. The metadata working group will also review metadata work for an HPC education and training catalog from the HPC-ED project, see here for more information. Meeting details are available here.

item.title: Educational Award For Outstanding Contribution to Computational Science Education at 9:00 AM EDT on Fri, Mar 3, 2024
item.description: The ACM SIGHPC Education Chapter is announcing an upcoming call for nominations for the 2024 education award to recognize outstanding contributions to computational, data-enabled science, and HPC education and training in all disciplines. The call for nominations will be issued in March, 2024 with a deadline for submissions on May 31 2024. We are seeking candidates who have led projects or programs that have made significant contributions to computational science education defined broadly to include all disciplines and all education levels.
